title: CE60146: Environmental Sanitation - Quick Facts
text:
CE60146
Course name | Environmental Sanitation
Offered by | Civil Engineering
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Plumbing: Building water supply and drainage, Ventilation, lighting, air conditioning and thermal insulation of buildings. Municipal sanitary standards and regulations, Sewage disposal in isolated unsewered areas:- Septic tanks, cesspools, imhoff tanks and their effluent disposal, Sanitation of public facilities:- Markets, swimming pools, schools, roads etc., Rural sanitation, Short and long term control of insects and rodents, vector and nuisance control.
